snippet: The bittersweet romantic musical “Once” was the unexpectedly dominant winner at the 66th annual Tony Awards on Sunday night, winning best musical, best actor and six other Tonys in a highly competitive year for Broadway honors.
abstract: Bittersweet romantic musical Once is the unexpectedly dominant winner at the 66th annual Tony Awards, winning best musical, best actor and six other Tonys in a highly competitive year for Broadway honors; list of major 2012 Tony Award winners noted.
lead_paragraph: The bittersweet romantic musical “Once” was the unexpectedly dominant winner at the 66th annual Tony Awards on Sunday night, winning best musical, best actor and six other Tonys in a highly competitive year for Broadway honors.

headline.main: ‘Once’ Basks in Glow of 8 Tony Awards
headline.print_headline: ‘Once’ Basks in Glow of 8 Tony Awards
